name: Clay Island - survival games
description:
A game of escape and survival from clay island!

Can you escape from this uninhabited island?

Many things are falling on the island. Eating and cooking the things falling on the island, and making the tools. You can also make fishing rods and fish! Get the meat of an animal by trap!

Even the places where you can not proceed due to obstacles while exploring the island, ... ... Leverage the tools you have and get over it!

Uninhabited island escape and survival game! Can you escape from this uninhabited island?
